original_text: We went onto a ship that had come from Adramyttium. This ship was ready to leave. It would sail to the towns on the coast of Asia region. A man called Aristarchus also sailed with us. He came from a city in Macedonia called Thessalonica.
korean_text: 아시아 해변 각처로 가려 하는 아드라뭇데노 배에 우리가 올라 항해할새 마게도냐의 데살로니가 사람 아리스다고도 함께 하니라

sentences.original_text: This ship was ready to leave
sentences.korean_translation: 이 배는 출발할 준비가 되어 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: It would sail to the towns
on the coast of Asia region
A man called Aristarchus also sailed with us
He came from a city in Macedonia
